snippet: The mayor praised Christine C. Quinn, the Council speaker and mayoral hopeful, a day after news broke suggesting he had urged Hillary Rodham Clinton to run in 2013.
abstract: New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg praises City Council Speaker Christine C Quinn, mayoral hopeful, a day after news broke suggesting he had urged Hillary Rodham Clinton to run in 2013.
lead_paragraph: The mayor praised Christine C. Quinn, the Council speaker and mayoral hopeful, a day after news broke suggesting he had urged Hillary Rodham Clinton to run in 2013.

headline.seo: In Wake of Clinton Revelation, Mayor Makes Amends
headline.main: After Courtship of Clinton, Bloomberg Makes Amends
headline.print_headline: After Courtship of Clinton, Bloomberg Makes Amends
